api_list.api_description: Query interface for searching arXiv articles.

optional_parameters.name: search_query
optional_parameters.description: Search terms used for the query.

api_list.api_description: Get a fact about a number from the Numbers API.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: An integer, 'random', or day of year 'month/day'.

query: Can you find recent articles related to quantum computing on arXiv? Also, tell me an interesting trivia about the number 42.
